overview: Manipulation 2 is the thrilling, feature-length conclusion to award-winning director Pierre Woodman's big-budget tale of a femme fatale driven to vengeance. Filmed on location in Cape Town, South Africa, Manipulation 2 is full of plot twists, airplane hijinks and pounding butt sex, including a raunchy DP and an outrageous three-girl anal orgy! This crime-and-passion whodunit has no-holes-barred sex you will never forget! The jizz facials are incredible-and so is the exotic scenery. With Manipulation 2 nothing-except the beautiful women and the steamy XXX sex-is what it seems!
title: Manipulation 2
